title: Become a League client update alpha tester

replies.body:

Edit: o no the downvotes.
Edit2: what the heck i swear this comment was at -10 earlier.

hold on, let me test it.

UPDATE

you can't.

ruined. the entire project is ruined. thanks. for ruining. the entire project. 

Edit: godamnit cactopus go to this website: https://www.codecademy.com/

Learn to code. And fix this huge gamebreaking issue. BY YOURSELF.

ok redfeenix, anything for you

i'll brb

Cactopus MVP in forums.

Down with the haters!

And P.S: I'm sure Cacto can code. (s)he'll code better than anyone that has the time to judge others skills ;)
in my heart you're the most popular <3
will there be any reward for doing this?

naw

but you get to use the updated client before other people

so I guess being cooler than other people is the reward
Can you check mine? it still says pending and i've applied for awhile now.
We can't check them individually! If you're approved, it'll just be as part of a giant batch randomly pulled from our pile of applicants. Pray to alpha zeus for good luck!
is there any way to cancel the sign{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  up
no. you get to get used to the new client before everyone else. thats the reward.
I just ate some bacon
was it good
I can confirm, bacon is usually good

Canadian Bacon?
or Mexican Bacon?
these are the questions that matter
How about you fix the actual game instead of a new client nobody cares about
You obviously don't understand what a new client is capable of.

It's capable of dis 

http://imgur.com/H4QNVUe
Getting rid of Zed? I'm in! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
RIP toasters
Cactopus, you are quickly becoming my favorite person from Riot!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} Keep on being hilarious!

ILY2

help us get this client ready by becoming a tester and I'll love you even more tho! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Cact-senpai, what's your favorite food? :O {{item:2054}}

My wife cooks the greatest chili I've ever had in my life. It's so potent, so rich, so creamy, so spicy. Sure, the gas the next day is worse than the nebulae produced by two stars colliding, but it's worth it.

When you find out he has a wife.

PO·TENT (ˈpōtnt)
_adjective_

1. Having great power, influence, or effect
''_thrones were potent symbols of authority_''

2. (of a male) able to achieve an erection or to reach an orgasm.

**''able to achieve an erection or to reach an orgasm.''** ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

OMG YOU REPLIEEEEEDDD{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} WOOOOHOOOOOO 

LET THE ALPHA GAMES BEGIN!!!
NICE! I am looking forward to being a part of Alpha! I love testing in PBE and I am so looking forward to testing in Alpha!!! T_T Com'on Riot, give me a chance! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
If you have a PBE account, I *think* it should automatically work with the alpha client. Try it out and let me know, okay?
Here's a suggestion - let us have only one role. Some people can only play one role and nothing else (at least not well enough).
The best part of being a support main is I don't really need to wait.
is there any reward for finding and reporting bugs and other things of that nature? Just wanted to know. Thanks
Yes when you report the bug it will be fixed rewarding you with a better experience.
When I saw "Join the alpha" in the post,I remembered tyler1 for some reason lol.{{champion:119}}
Hehe xd? -me to everyone who picks draven
{{champion:150}} ly
RIOT PLS HELP who ever owns this account has hacked my bro ********AKHLOUI@HOTMAIL.COM.
so I think I deserve to be in the Gnarly alpha test because if you don't, I will get my favourite Gnarwhal and destroy you
Is there any way to cancel the sign up, because my friend told me that the alpha will be laggy and buggy and it is not worth it.  You can't play with your friends with the normal servers can you

Those with the alpha client will still be able to play with those who do not have the alpha client. It is still connected directly to the LIVE servers! You'll get to try out the new client before everyone else. There is potential for bugs, but that is the tradeoff for getting to test the new material before it is launched! I believe you will also be able to launch the client's legacy version as well (the current, non-alpha version), if you decide to.
Cactopus already tried, sadly you can't open the alpha and non-alpha client at the same time {{item:3070}}
Not at the same time, no, but you can still close the alpha and open the legacy client.
